title: The Curb between us
brief_description: As a result of a car accident, Terry Kelly became a disabled person. After nine months in hospital Terry tries to rebuild his life with family, friends and his studies. Examines questions such as how it feels to be disabled and the prejudices and problems encountered by the disabled.
